title: Game-Based Instructional Design Workshop for Sustaining Adolescent Learning Engagement

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Acquiring methods for elementary school teachers to apply game-based learning environments in fostering sustained student engagement

learning_goals: Learners can propose at least three instructional design plans incorporating game mechanics (levels, feedback, rewards).
Learners can analyze youth engagement elements (challenge, social interaction) in VR/simulation environments.
Learners can develop assessment tools (checklists, participation metrics) to measure sustained learning engagement.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
